Arguments.Name: in_strInputDate
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please Provide Search date in this format - ("yyyy-MM-dd").
Example : 2024-12-01

Arguments.Name: in_strRequiredInputDay
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please Provide next Working day you want for want to business requirement.
Example : Wednesday

Arguments.Name: out_strOutDate
Arguments.Tooltip:
This will be output in this format - ("yyyy-MM-dd").
Example : 2024-12-01

Arguments.Name: in_strCalenderName
Arguments.Tooltip: Please Provide Caleder Name from which you wish to read excluded dates. Plesae note Caleder Name must be defined in Orchestrator.

Arguments.Name: in_excMsgInvalidCalendarName
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please provide exception message for invalidate calendar name. 
Example : Invalid calendar name found.

Arguments.Name: in_intMaxLoopCounter
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please provide the maximum number of loop iternations to perform. This counter number will prevent code from infinite loop. 
Example : in_intMaxLoopCounter=10 , if counter is increased by 10 then exception message will be generated.

Arguments.Name: in_excMessageMaxLoopCounter
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please provide exception message for maximum counter value reached. 
Example : Maximum loop attempts are reached, Please increase IntMaxLoopCounter value and try again.

Arguments.Name: in_excMsgCalenDaysNotFound
Arguments.Tooltip:
Please provide exception message for Non-working days not defined in calendar.
Example : No single working days found in calendar. Please check Orchestrator Non-working days in Calender.
